subject: Attn: Sir
body:
Attn: Sir
I have decided to contact you through this medium after reviewing your
Honorable and reputable profile and it is my belief that with your
Position as a professional in your sector/ Country that you will be In
position to present us with solid investment opportunities in your
Country, sector and other areas of investment.
Presently I am representing a Private Group of Investors who are
Royalties and Political Figure in their Countries as their PRIVATE
FAMILY WEALTH MANAGER and my group of Investors with access to
Substantial intended investment capital which they would like to see
Their funds and asset relocated and re-invested in your Country/
Sector with your credible and reputable assistance.
We are ready to Provide you, your partners and clients with private
investment finance Either as Joint Venture Partnership project
financing or as Private Investment Loans to enable you, your partners
and clients to establish New projects or improve, expand and actualize
your existing investment Projects and at the same time you will be in
total control of the bulk Available investment capital as their FUND
PORTFOLIO MANAGER in your Country/ Region and you will oversee all
Investment ventures within Your Region.
We will conduct all of our investment transactions discretely in a
100% legal manner and you, your client and partners will have the
Opportunity to confirm and receive the due Investment funds through a
Prime Bank. AT THE SAME TIME WE WILL PAY YOU A 2% BROKER? COMMISSION
IF YOU INTRODUCE A CREDIBLE PROJECT OWNER WHO IS INTERESTED AND IN
NEED OF CREDIBLE FINANCING FOR HIS OR HER PROJECT.
Let me know if you have a solid investment plan that needs credible
Investment financing and you can email me your proposed project
Details directly, along with the executive project summary/ plan and I
Will provide you with details, documents and picture ID to
Authenticate our investment offer.
Regards,
Dr. Thomas Robert.

subject: Re:   Attn: Sir
body:
Hello Dr. Thomas Robert,

Thank you for reaching out and considering me for such an important role. I'm flattered by your trust in my abilities to manage funds and oversee investment ventures.

I'm curious about the nature of these investments. Could you please provide more details about the type of projects your group is interested in? Are there any specific sectors or industries that you prefer?

Also, could you elaborate on the process of confirming and receiving the investment funds through a Prime Bank? I'd like to understand this better.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Shirley

subject: Re: Attn: Sir
body:
Attn: Shirley

Please accept our sincere apology for not responding sooner, we have
been deliberating on your response to our Private Investment finance
offer and before we proceed further, we would like you to state
clearly if you are interested in a PRIVATE INVESTMENT LOAN or if you
are interested in working in Partnership with us as your SILENT
INVESTMENT PARTNERS at which you will have absolute control over our
investment and its operations.  Kindly inform us if you need a Loan or
Joint Venture Partnership finance for your project.

I have decided to take up all communication on our investment project
after reading your messages, which we are 100% ready, willing and able
to provide you with the necessary investment Loan amount to enable you
commence with your investment project in your Country.

It is with great pleasure to finally open and establish direct contact
with you at this point. In a brief introduction, I am Dr. Albert
MEYER, one of the principal investors that the consultant, Dr. Thomas
Robert who has been communicating with you about our possible
provision of a Private Investment Loan for your proposed projects.

Before we proceed further I want you to know that I am the Co-
Investor and CFO representing the Private Group of Investors who are
Royalties and Political Figure in their Countries as their PRIVATE
FAMILY WEALTH MANAGER and my group of Investors with access to
substantial intended investment capital which they would like to see
their funds and asset relocated and re-invested in your Country/
Sector with your credible and reputable assistance and we would like
to treat this transaction as a Private Investment initiative between
your good self and we the investors and the terms and conditions have
been designed to protect our investment and as well guarantee the
smooth and successful release of the due investment funds to you
accordingly, you are working with us directly.

In accordance with your mail, I am obliged to inform you that we have
an available substantial combined mapped out investment cash
allocation between the Group of Investors from which we will finance
your project. Secondly we are seeking means of expanding and
relocating our investment interest to your Country/ Region in your
sector and any other sector that you will suggest and advise for
meaningful investment.

Presently my credible and reputable group of Investors has expressed
interest to finance reasonable, credible and lucrative business
ventures from serious and credible Project Owners like your good self.
And my principal partners/ investors are open to financing any
legitimate and credible investment ventures that you will present to
us and we can negotiate the grace period between 1 to 3 years before
you will commence on the initial payment of our Private Investment
Loan Annual Interest Rate at a 3% and in the case of a Joint Venture
Partnership investment, 10% to 49% of the Annual Return on Investment
earned on each of our joint venture investment, which will last for
the full duration 1 to 10 years, which is subject to renewal as long
as you have a credible and legitimate business project and as long as
you are ready to comply with the simple proceedings, terms and
conditions of our transaction.

Before we proceed further I would like you to know that our Investment
Companies through which we conduct majority of our investment
transaction are based in Morocco, Brazil/ Qatar and as such we have
employed the services of our appointed Financial Administrators
overseas to mediate, coordinate all legal signing, filing,
notarization of all binding documents and our Contract Agreement,
which will be followed with the onward release of the necessary agreed
investment funds to the BORROWER or our Joint Venture Partner as
agreed.

Please note that you will visit the office of our appointed Financial
Administrator where the binding Contract Agreement will be Legally
documented, Authenticated, Filed and Notarized legally at the Law
Office, Finance Ministry and Tax Office and once this is done you will
proceed to our nominated releasing Bank with our appointed Financial
Administrator and Bank Consultant, where you will confirm the
available Investment amount and as well receive the due investment
loan or Joint Venture Partnership investment amount in full.

We will also enter into and sign a NON- DISCLOSURE CONTRACT AGREEMENT
to protect you and your project from any form of piracy and publicity
and as well issue you with our Letter of Intent (LOI) to confirm our
intention to finance your loan request.

At this point I would request that you proceed to forward your project
details, Project Summary and Plan of your proposed investment venture
via email attachment for my review, consideration and acceptance. I
would also like you to indicate the required investment amount and I
would like to find out the extent, progress and investment finance
that you have involved or invested so far on the said project and
finally I would like to find out how soon you will like to receive the
necessary investment finance for the said project as we are ready,
willing and able to finance credible project within the next 5 to 7
working days if the Project Owner is ready to meet with us and comply
with our legal requirements and proceedings which will protect we, the
INVESTORS/ LENDER against any   breach of Contract from you, the
BORROWER.

In accordance with our proceedings, we want you to understand that our
basic terms and conditions are as follows. 1. You will be required to
sign a binding contract agreement which will be legally authenticated
to certify our transaction, which will be notarized and legalized to
protect our investment and the interest of both parties. 2. You will
be required to travel to meet with our Co- Investor, Financial
Administrators and Private Investment Bankers at any of locations
mentioned below, where you will confirm our available investment fund/
PROOF OF FUND, to be preceded with the onward release of the due
investment amount to you either in UNITED KINGDOM, TURKEY, DUBAI, OR
SPAIN.

Kindly stand informed that we are ready willing and able to provide
and finance your investment project within the next 5 to 7 days
through the international assistance of our Financial Administrators
and Private Investment Bankers, if you are willing and ready to comply
with our Legal requirements, proceedings, terms and conditions
accordingly for a legal and hitch free transaction.

WE WILL PAY YOU A 2% BROKER’S COMMISSION IF YOU INTRODUCE A CREDIBLE
PROJECT OWNERS WHO ARE INTERESTED AND IN NEED OF CREDIBLE FINANCING
FOR HIS OR HER PROJECT.

We are ready to proceed as soon as possible if you are ready and serious.

I am looking forward to a fruitful business relationship with you.
Regards,

Dr. Albert MEYER, Thomas Robert & Partners
